import axios from 'axios'; import React from 'react'; import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button'; import history from '../../history' function QuestionComponent(props){ return(

Event Name: {props.eventName}

Date: {props.date}

Name and Surname: {props.name} {props.surname}

T.C.: {props.tc}

Question:

{props.question}

); } export default QuestionComponent;
